Explore

Weeaboo is a mostly derogatory slang term for a Western person who is obsessed with Japanese culture, especially anime, often regarding it as superior to all other cultures.

Find Out More

Explore & Connect

Weeaboo is a termed used towards anyone who even slightly likes anime.What truly makes a person a ‘’weeaboo’’ is an individual is not Japanese who fetishizes the Japanese-Culture and show no respect for themselves, others and their own culture.

Its supposed to mean a kind of person that likes anime culture to such a point they grow to dislike their own.
They usually only have a basic knowledge of Japanese culture, and usually thinks that Japan is amazing, despite most of the information they know of it from anime and manga.
These people attempt to become Japanese by making the Japanese culture appear superior over the culture the individual is born with.
obviously obsessed with Japanese culture & anime, to the point where he has to cosplay as a female character.
They are annoying, but not much more than that.

週末は日本人ではない人ですが、彼らがいたことを願っています。 彼らは日本の文化にとらわれています。 彼らは日本語の単語を毎日の言語に統合します。 彼らは卑劣な層の嫌です。
